Definition at line 82 of file autoCropUtils.cpp.

◆ cropVerticesOrdering()

bool cropVerticesOrdering ( std::vector< cv::Point2f > &  contour)

Contour points ordering.

Parameters
[in,out]contourContour.
Returns
true if ordering is successful.
Note
Implementation of this function is based on Pyimagesearch.

This should be 4 for rectangles, but it allows to be extended to more complex cases

Find convex hull of points

Find top left point, as starting point. This is the nearest to (0.0) point

Now starting point index in source array is in indices[minDistanceIdx] convex hull vertices are sorted clockwise in indices array, so transfer them to result beginning from starting point to the end of array...

... and from the begin of array up to starting point
